tokens.name: MADURO / SOL

- **Stop Loss**: Low volatility (7.7% price change) → -5% to -8% (conservative for stable momentum).  
- **Time Frame**: Low volume → 2h to 6h (short-term for liquidity).  
- **Flow Momentum**: Stable → standard parameters applied.
